results.title: Looper
results.creator_credit: Ram Bergman Productions, Endgame Entertainment, DMG Entertainment, FilmDistrict, Ed Verreaux, Sharen Davis, James D. Stern, Rian Johnson, Ram Bergman and TriStar Pictures
results.headline_credit: China and United States of America, 2012
results.brief_description: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market, where the mob uses it to send hitmen into the past to assassinate targets.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ram Bergman Productions, Endgame Entertainment, DMG Entertainment, FilmDistrict, Ed Verreaux, Sharen Davis, James D. Stern, Rian Johnson, Ram Bergman and TriStar Pictures
results.description: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a looper, a hired gun, like Joe is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good until the day the mob decides to close the loop, sending back Joe’s future self for assassination.
description_for_label: In the futuristic action thriller Looper, time travel will be invented but it will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a looper, a hired gun, like Joe is waiting to mop up. Joe is getting rich and life is good until the day the mob decides to close the loop, sending back Joe’s future self for assassination.

results.title: Looking for Alibrandi
results.brief_description: The film “Looking for Alibrandi” begins light-heartedly, and the viewer gets a very quick understanding of Josie’s character through her interactions with her friends and family.
results.description: The film “Looking for Alibrandi” begins light-heartedly, and the viewer gets a very quick understanding of Josie’s character through her interactions with her friends and family.

results.title: Lonesome Ghosts
results.brief_description: On a dark and stormy night, four bored ghosts decide to have some fun by calling the “Ajax Ghost Exterminators.” Shriek with laughter as ghost hunters Mickey, Donald and Goofy are scared silly by the hilarious haunts and taunts of these spirited pranksters!
results.description: On a dark and stormy night, four bored ghosts decide to have some fun by calling the “Ajax Ghost Exterminators.” Shriek with laughter as ghost hunters Mickey, Donald and Goofy are scared silly by the hilarious haunts and taunts of these spirited pranksters!

results.title: Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman
results.creator_credit: Robert Butler, Robert Singer and Chris Long
results.brief_description: A much more lavish version of the popular Superman television series which had first aired forty years earlier, Lois & Clark focused more on the Man of Steel’s early adult years in Metropolis. With the unknowing help of Lois Lane, Clark Kent created Superman there in Metropolis after finding work at the world-famous Daily Planet newspaper, where he meets fellow reporter Lois Lane.

constellations_other.name: News on location
constellations_other.description: The Pye Orthicon is an example of the type of television cameras used from the 1950s in Australia for both studio and outside broadcast work. Such cameras did not have have the capacity to record while out on location and so outside crews would transmit vision and sound back to studios for recording or live broadcast.

results.title_for_label: Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman
results.creator_credit_for_label: Robert Butler, Robert Singer and Chris Long

results.title: Little Red Riding Hood
results.creator_credit: Laugh-O-Gram Films, Walt Disney and Charles Parrault
results.brief_description: Disney’s 1922 animated version of Little Red Riding Hood was one of the first moving image works of the famous cautionary tale not to talk to strangers.

constellations_other.name: Cautionary tales and magic lantern projectors
constellations_other.description: Early magic lantern projections depicted cautionary religious scenes and fairytales, just like cinema did in its infancy.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Laugh-O-Gram Films, Walt Disney and Charles Parrault
results.description: Mother is making donuts: She throws up a circle of dough, and a cat shoots a hole in it. Later, he fishes them out of the oil with a fishing line; he eats one, and loses all 9 lives. Mother puts together a basket for Red to take to granny. Red uses her cart, which is pushed by her little dog; the cart gets a flat tire, and she inflates a donut to replace it. A wolf (a human lothario) drives by in a flivver, and dashes off to grandma’s house, where he finds a note saying she’s gone to the movies. He shrinks his car and stashes it in his pocket, then waits for Red, who stopped to watch a dancing flower. Red arrives, and they go into the house, where he attempts to have his way with her. The dog rushes off and gets help from an airplane pilot, who uses a skyhook to remove the house and, ultimately, lift the wolf in his car and drop him in the lake. Written by Jon Reeves
description_for_label: Mother is making donuts: She throws up a circle of dough, and a cat shoots a hole in it. results.title: Little Monsters
results.headline_credit: Australia, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.brief_description: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

constellations_other.name: Blood, shot
constellations_other.description: The fake blood used by costume designer Edie Kurzer in Judy & Punch is connected to a long, bloody lineage in cinema.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Australia, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
results.description: A washed-up musician teams up with a teacher and a kids show personality to protect young children from a sudden outbreak of zombies.

results.title: Little J & Big Cuz
results.brief_description: Little J, he’s five and Big Cuz, she’s nine. They’re a couple of Indigenous Australian kids living with their Nanna and Old Dog.

constellations_primary.name: Little J & Big Cuz to Blade
constellations_primary.description: Discover how some of the best indigenous works connect to comic book blockbusters and martial arts videogames.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherhead’s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.

results.description: Little J, he’s five and Big Cuz, she’s nine. They’re a couple of Indigenous Australian kids living with their Nanna and Old Dog.
description_for_label: Little J, he’s five and Big Cuz, she’s nine. They’re a couple of Indigenous Australian kids living with their Nanna and Old Dog.

results.title: Lift Off
results.brief_description: Lift Off was an Australian educational television series that was broadcast on ABC Television from 1992 until the series ended in 1995.

constellations_other.name: Learning through play
constellations_other.description: Alexander Stitt and Bruce Weatherhead’s Zoetrope to Cinemascope educated children about the moving image through posters, cut-outs, puzzles and games, but moving image works have also been used to educate and entertain kids about all aspects of life.

results.description: Lift Off was an Australian educational television series that was broadcast on ABC Television from 1992 until the series ended in 1995. Each episode featured a live action storyline about a group of young children, and the problems they encountered with growing up, their parents, and various other social issues. Episodes would also feature segments of short animation, puppetry and documentary segments, as well as various songs, stories, and word games. Aimed at 3 to 8 year olds based on the ideas of Harvard University development psychologist Howard Gardner. The series was linked with the school curricula through the Curriculum Corporation of Australia. The different episodes used stories and locations to explore subjects such as jealousy, loneliness and anger.
description_for_label: Lift Off was an Australian educational television series that was broadcast on ABC Television from 1992 until the series ended in 1995. Each episode featured a live action storyline about a group of young children, and the problems they encountered with growing up, their parents, and various other social issues. Episodes would also feature segments of short animation, puppetry and documentary segments, as well as various songs, stories, and word games. Aimed at 3 to 8 year olds based on the ideas of Harvard University development psychologist Howard Gardner. The series was linked with the school curricula through the Curriculum Corporation of Australia. The different episodes used stories and locations to explore subjects such as jealousy, loneliness and anger.

results.title: Life or Something Like It
results.creator_credit: 20th Century Fox, Monarchy Enterprises S.a.r.l., Regency Enterprises, Davis Entertainment, New Regency Pictures, Epsilon Motion Pictures, Atchity Entertainment International (AEI), Bill Groom, Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Dana Stevens, Stephen Herek and John Scott Shepherd
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2002
results.brief_description: A reporter Lanie Kerrigan interviews a psychic homeless man for a fluff piece about a football game’s score. Instead he tells her that her life has no meaning and is going to end in just a few days, which sparks her to action, trying to change the pattern of her life…
results.creator_credit_for_label: 20th Century Fox, Monarchy Enterprises S.a.r.l., Regency Enterprises, Davis Entertainment, New Regency Pictures, Epsilon Motion Pictures, Atchity Entertainment International (AEI), Bill Groom, Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Dana Stevens, Stephen Herek and John Scott Shepherd

results.title: Lichtspiel: Opus I
results.brief_description: Against a dark background, several bright, curved or rounded shapes pulse towards the center of the screen, one at a time. They are followed by many other shapes, some irregular, some pointed, others rounded. The abstract shapes move into or across the screen in harmony with the musical score.

constellations_other.name: Colour and illusion
constellations_other.description: Exploring the science of colour, light, reflection and movement.

They are followed by many other shapes, some irregular, some pointed, others rounded. The abstract shapes move into or across the screen in harmony with the musical score.
